title: DH should be the AoE burst keystone and Electro should be the single target
body:
That's the only way both of these runes can exist and both have a use.

DH needs to do less damage than electro and have a period where you can proc it on more than one person(after first proc) and then go on cd afterward so it's not just a better electro.

replies.body: No. Comet is the AoE damage rune. Harvest is for people with big single burst nukes like Veigar and Annie.
